name: Fierce Race Chained Cars
description:
Fierce Race Chained Cars is the package of thrilling chain breaker challenge, high speed racer battle simulator and featuring highly exciting realistic environment. Get ready for amazing and thrilling chained cars battle between you and your diversion rival.Mostly chain car driving games which you have played in past are endless but this entertainment simulation masti packet is not.
Features:
- Realistic High Quality Graphics Display
- Multiple challenging levels based on chain break stunts track
- Smooth Controls for hero Character
- Multiple Camera Views to explore the Environment.
- Multiple Luxury Cars with extreme race speed like asphalt
- Thrilling Crash and racing sound effect.
